      <div class="fit-wide background-wrap"> 
       <div class="abstract-half-dot abstract-half-dot--top-circle abstract-half-dot--large-circle abstract-half-dot--negative-right-circle"></div>

       <div class="grid2 grid--autoflow-row grid--gap-x-large grid--m-2"> 
        <div> <a href="https://player.vimeo.com/video/342728782?title=0&amp;byline=0&amp;portrait=0" data-effect="mfp-zoom-in" class="open-modalvideo background-wrap sg-icon"> <img class="center-elem lazyload" data-src="https://damt7w3yoa0t2.cloudfront.net/img/tutorials/tutorial_client_interface.png" alt="Client Interface Video cover" width="6.75" height="3.65"> 
          <div class="pos-abs-center sg-icon sg-icon--size_54 sg-icon--color-white"> 
           <svg id="b0a847d2-f7a6-4639-a2d8-f820f3642e9f" data-name="Layer 1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewbox="0 0 126.5 126.5">
            <title>icon_play_btn</title><path d="M63.25,0A63.25,63.25,0,1,0,126.5,63.25,63.25,63.25,0,0,0,63.25,0ZM47.882,89.1V35.4L86.874,62.249Z" />
           </svg> 
          </div> </a> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h2 class="title color-white title--size-large title--regular title--weight-bold title--subtitle-density-medium title--line-top-left">Awesome client interfaces to build and manage your sites easily</h2> 
         <p class="text text--size-medium color-white density--medium no-padding--top">Take a look at how easy and intuitive it is to create sites and manage them with the wide range of tools we offer.</p> <a href="https://player.vimeo.com/video/342728782?title=0&amp;byline=0&amp;portrait=0" data-effect="mfp-zoom-in" class="open-modalvideo btn btn--bg-transparent-small btn--size-semi-large btn--text-regular btn--density-large">Watch video</a> 
        </div> 
       </div> 
      </div> 
     </section> 
     <section class="features-premium"> 
      <div class="fit-wide"> 
       <h2 class="title title--regular title--size-large title--line-center title--weight-bold title--cap color-darkest acenter mb10">Premium value on higher plans</h2> 
       <p class="title title--subtitle title--size-semimedium title--weight-normal color-dark title--subtitle-density-large acenter">Crafted for growth and performance</p> 
       <div class="grid2 grid--autoflow-row grid--gap-xx-large grid--sm-3 grid--gap-none-767"> 
        <div class="flex flex--direction-column flex--wrap-column-center flex--align-stretch text-align--r"> 
         <div class="density--small no-padding--top"> 
          <h5 class="title title--size-medium color-darkest title--regular title--weight-bold">Host multiple sites</h5> 
          <h6 class="title title--size-semimedium color-dark title--regular title--weight-medium mb20">?n GrowBig &amp; GoGeek plans</h6> 
          <p class="text text--size-medium color-darkest">Create as many sites as you want and host them under one account. <span class="modalbox"><a href="#multisites" data-effect="mfp-zoom-in" class="text-link text--weight-medium text-link--inblock text-link--color-blue">Find out more</a></span></p> 
         </div> 
         <div class="density--small border--top-solid-light"> 
          <h5 class="title title--size-medium color-darkest title--regular title--weight-bold">Ultrafast PHP</h5> 
          <h6 class="title title--size-semimedium color-dark title--regular title--weight-medium mb20">?n GrowBig &amp; GoGeek plans</h6> 
          <p class="text text--size-medium color-darkest">Unique PHP setup for great TTFB (time to first byte) and overall site speed. <span class="modalbox"><a href="#premium-ultrafast-php" data-effect="mfp-zoom-in" class="text-link text--weight-medium text-link--inblock text-link--color-blue">Find out more</a></span></p> 
         </div> 
         <div class="density--small border--top-solid-light"> 
          <h5 class="title title--size-medium color-darkest title--regular title--weight-bold">Easy staging tool</h5> 
          <h6 class="title title--size-semimedium color-dark title--regular title--weight-medium mb20">?n GrowBig &amp; GoGeek plans</h6> 
          <p class="text text--size-medium color-darkest">Create a copy of your site and test changes before pushing them live. <span class="modalbox"><a href="#staging" data-effect="mfp-zoom-in" class="text-link text--weight-medium text-link--inblock text-link--color-blue">Find out more</a></span></p> 
         </div> 
         <div class="density--small border--top-solid-light"> 
          <div class="density--x-small no-padding--top"> <span class="sg-label sg-label--type-salmon sg-label--size-large">New</span> 
          </div> 
          <h5 class="title title--size-medium color-darkest title--regular title--weight-bold">Add Collaborators</h5> 
          <h6 class="title title--size-semimedium color-dark title--regular title--weight-medium mb20">?n GrowBig &amp; GoGeek plans</h6> 
          <p class="text text--size-medium color-darkest">Invite collaborators and give them their own login to your site. <span class="modalbox"><a href="#premium-collaborators-link" data-effect="mfp-zoom-in" class="text-link text--weight-medium text-link--inblock text-link--color-blue">Find out more</a></span></p> 
         </div> 
        </div> 
        <div class="sg-icon sg-icon--fill-initial acenter no-display-767">

          </div> 
          <h5 class="title title--size-medium color-darkest title--regular title--weight-bold">Add white-label clients</h5> 
          <h6 class="title title--size-semimedium color-dark title--regular title--weight-medium mb20">?n GoGeek plan</h6>

     </section> 
     <section class="reviews background-wrap pattern--highlight lazyload"> 
      <div class="fit-wide"> 
       <div class="flex flex--justify-space-between"> 
        <div class="reviews__title"> 
         <h2 class="title title--regular title--size-large title--line-top-left title--weight-bold title--cap color-darkest title--subtitle-density-medium mb10">Trusted by Clients and Industry Experts Alike</h2> 
         <p class="text text--size-medium color-dark pb30">We are hosting 2,000,000 domains while making website owners less stressed, more productive, and hopefully just a little happier. Were honored and humbled by the great feedback we receive from our customers on a daily basis. Were proud to have kept our customer satisfaction rate at 98% and even increasing it every year for the past five years.</p> <a class="btn btn--size-semi-large btn--density-large btn--bg-transparent-small btn--border-dark" href="/siteground_reviews.htm">Read reviews</a> 
        </div> 
        <div class="reviews__wrap"> 
         <div class="swiper-container swiper-container--slider swiper-container--random"> 
          <div class="swiper-wrapper"> 
           <div class="swiper-slide review"> 
            <div class="review__intro"> 
             <div class="review__picture"> 
              <img class="lazyload" data-src="https://du3vkre908mr5.cloudfront.net/img/testimonials/syed_balkhi.jpg" alt="Syed Balkhi" width="2.4" height="1.6"> 
             </div> 
             <div class="review__name"> 
              <h3 class="title title--regular title--weight-medium title--cap title--size-medium color-darkest">Syed Balkhi</h3> <a class="text text--size-large color-dark" href="http://www.wpbeginner.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener">http://www.wpbeginner.com</a> 
             </div> 
            </div> 
            <p class="text text--size-medium color-dark text--style-italic">SiteGround is a great hosting solution for all your WordPress projects - both new and established ones. The service they provide is stable, secure and super fast thanks to the special tools they've developed in-house for WordPress users.</p> 
           </div> 
           <div class="swiper-slide review"> 
            <div class="review__intro"> 
             <div class="review__picture"> 
              <img class="lazyload" data-src="https://d3fjrnfgbgznt3.cloudfront.net/img/testimonials/joost_de_valk.jpg" alt="Joost de Valk" width="2.4" height="1.6"> 
             </div> 
             <div class="review__name"> 
              <h3 class="title title--regular title--weight-medium title--cap title--size-medium color-darkest">Joost de Valk</h3> <span class="text text--size-large color-dark">Yoast SEO Founder and CPO</span> 
             </div> 
            </div> 
            <p class="text text--size-medium color-dark text--style-italic">We keep track of which hosts we get a lot of support requests for, so we can reach out to them. We had a hard time finding SiteGround in that list as we had so few complaints from customers hosted with them.</p> 
           </div> 
           <div class="swiper-slide review"> 
            <div class="review__intro"> 
             <div class="review__picture"> 
              <img class="lazyload" data-src="https://damt7w3yoa0t2.cloudfront.net/img/testimonials/jenny_wong.jpg" alt="Jenny Wong" width="2.4" height="1.6"> 
             </div> 
             <div class="review__name"> 
              <h3 class="title title--regular title--weight-medium title--cap title--size-medium color-darkest">Jenny Wong</h3> <span class="text text--size-large color-dark">Engineering Manager at Human Made</span> 
             </div> 
            </div> 
            <p class="text text--size-medium color-dark text--style-italic">What I like about SiteGround is the support is super friendly and attentive. I also love how easy it is that I work on my site locally, push to GitHub and it just magically appears on the server. I really appreciate not having to think about the site and the upgrades too.</p> 
           </div> 
           <div class="swiper-slide review"> 
            <div class="review__intro"> 
             <div class="review__picture"> 
              <img class="lazyload" data-src="https://du3vkre908mr5.cloudfront.net/img/testimonials/matt_cromwell.jpg" alt="Matt Cromwell" width="2.4" height="1.6"> 
             </div> 
             <div class="review__name"> 
              <h3 class="title title--regular title--weight-medium title--cap title--size-medium color-darkest">Matt Cromwell</h3> <a class="text text--size-large color-dark" href="https://mattcromwell.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://mattcromwell.com</a> 
             </div> 
            </div> 
            <p class="text text--size-medium color-dark text--style-italic">I can't say enough good things about SiteGround. I highly recommend their GoGeek shared hosting platform if you are a developer on a budget but still want advanced features like staging, GitHub integration, and of course the SuperCacher.</p> 
           </div> 
           <div class="swiper-slide review"> 
            <div class="review__intro"> 
             <div class="review__picture"> 
              <img class="lazyload" data-src="https://d3fjrnfgbgznt3.cloudfront.net/img/testimonials/rian_rietveld.jpg" alt="Rian Rietveld" width="2.4" height="1.6"> 
             </div> 
             <div class="review__name"> 
              <h3 class="title title--regular title--weight-medium title--cap title--size-medium color-darkest">Rian Rietveld</h3> <span class="text text--size-large color-dark">Senior Accessibility Consultant with Level Level</span> 
             </div> 
            </div> 
            <p class="text text--size-medium color-dark text--style-italic">The SiteGround support team keeps amazing me. I love the chat function, where I always get a prompt answer and help, in my own timezone. Even if a question take longer to answer, Im reassured that they will return with a solution.</p> 
           </div> 
           <div class="swiper-slide review"> 
            <div class="review__intro"> 
             <div class="review__picture"> 
              <img class="lazyload" data-src="https://damt7w3yoa0t2.cloudfront.net/img/testimonials/andrey_savchenko.jpg" alt="Andrey Savchenko" width="2.4" height="1.6"> 
             </div> 
             <div class="review__name"> 
              <h3 class="title title--regular title--weight-medium title--cap title--size-medium color-darkest">Andrey Savchenko</h3> <span class="text text--size-large color-dark">WordPress Developer</span> 
             </div> 
            </div> 
            <p class="text text--size-medium color-dark text--style-italic">I am passionate about web performance. It takes a hosting committed to performance to match that passion. SG Optimizer delivers powerful cache for WordPress data, assets, and pages with a flip of a switch. Even on the shared plans!</p> 
           </div> 
           <div class="swiper-slide review"> 
            <div class="review__intro"> 
             <div class="review__picture"> 
              <img class="lazyload" data-src="https://du3vkre908mr5.cloudfront.net/img/testimonials/monique_dubbleman.jpg" alt="Monique Dubbleman" width="2.4" height="1.6"> 
             </div> 
             <div class="review__name"> 
              <h3 class="title title--regular title--weight-medium title--cap title--size-medium color-darkest">Monique Dubbleman</h3> <span class="text text--size-large color-dark">Independent designer at BOE!media</span> 
             </div> 
            </div> 
            <p class="text text--size-medium color-dark text--style-italic">I moved all my clients WordPress websites to SiteGround hosting a few years ago and it was the best decision I ever made. I can now easily add new clients, new websites, SSL certificates and other features from one dashboard. Through the staging environment, its easy to test new features on your website. With one click you can upload it to the production site. If this fails after all, theres a daily backup that covers you with a one click restore option.</p> 
           </div> 
           <div class="swiper-slide review"> 
            <div class="review__intro"> 
             <div class="review__picture"> 
              <img class="lazyload" data-src="https://d3fjrnfgbgznt3.cloudfront.net/img/testimonials/rian_kinney.jpg" alt="Rian Kinney" width="2.4" height="1.6">

            <p class="text text--size-medium color-dark text--style-italic">I have been a happy customer of SiteGround for 2 years now. transform="translate(-0.5 -0.5)" />
       </svg> 
      </div> 
      <div class="fit-wide"> 
       <h2 class="title color-white title--size-extralarge title--regular title--weight-bold title--density-small title--cap">Ready to get started?</h2> 
       <p class="text text--size-large text--wrapper800 color-white pb30">Choose the hosting provider that helps you start easy, build fast, and grow strong! Its risk-free with our 30-days money back guarantee.</p> 
       <div class="flex--wrap-row-center"> <a href="/shared/step1.htm" class="btn btn--size-x-large btn--density-large btn--bg-orange btn--text-regular btn--text-regular-size flex__btn--margin-medium">Get Started</a> <a href="" id="chat_visible" style="display:none" onclick="Live.launch(event)" class="btn btn--size-x-large btn--density-large btn--bg-transparent btn--text-regular btn--text-regular-size flex__btn--margin-medium">Chat with an expert</a> 
       </div> 
      </div> 
     </section> 
    </section> 
    <div class="features-info text--wrapper300" id="plan-staging"> 
     <div> 
      <div style="padding: 5px 10px;"> 
       <p class="text text--size-x-small color-darkest">Our staging feature is available for WordPress websites. It allows you to create a copy of your live site on a separate, staging environment with a single click. You can test any new code and designs on the staging copy, prior to pushing those changes to the production site. Pushing from staging to live takes only one click and automatically creates a backup of your live site, in case you need to reverse the changes.</p> 
      </div> 
     </div> 
    </div> 
    <div class="features-info text--wrapper300" id="plan-collaborators"> 
     <div> 
      <div style="padding: 5px 10px;"> 
       <p class="text text--size-x-small color-darkest">You can add collaborators to your site who get their own SiteGround Accounts and individual login to the Site Tools of your site and can build or maintain it for you. They can also contact support for your site from their Account.</p> 
      </div> 
     </div> 
    </div> 
    <div class="features-info text--wrapper300" id="white-label-clients"> 
     <div> 
      <div style="padding: 5px 10px;"> 
       <p class="text text--size-x-small color-darkest">You can register your clients as users in your Account and give them white-label access to the Site Tools of the sites you build for them. When your client logs in the Site Tools of their website, they won't see SiteGround logo or name anywhere so you can provide white-label hosting service.</p> 
      </div> 
     </div> 
    </div> 
    <div class="features-info text--wrapper300" id="high-tier-resources"> 
     <div> 
      <div style="padding: 5px 10px;"> 
       <p class="text text--size-x-small color-darkest">The GoGeek plan allows you to use more server resources than any other of our shared hosting plans. This includes more simultaneous connections and processes, more CPU seconds, higher process execution time, and more.</p> 
      </div> 
     </div> 
    </div> 
    <div class="features-info text--wrapper300" id="ultrafast-php"> 
     <div> 
      <div style="padding: 5px 10px;"> 
       <p class="text text--size-x-small color-darkest">Our unique PHP implementation makes your pages load faster, cutting the TTFB (time to first byte) and allowing the server to process more of your visits faster.</p> 
      </div> 
     </div> 
    </div> 
    <div class="features-info text--wrapper300" id="priority-support"> 
     <div> 
      <div style="padding: 5px 10px;"> 
       <p class="text text--size-x-small color-darkest">Issues initiated on chat or ticket by our GoGeek users are assigned with priority to our most experienced support agents available. This ensures an exceptional quality and speed of the technical support provided.</p> 
      </div> 
     </div> 
    </div> 
    <div class="features-info text--wrapper300" id="free-domain"> 
     <div> 
      <div style="padding: 5px 10px;"> 
       <p class="text text--size-x-small color-darkest">We offer a free domain registration for the first year upon sign-up.</p> 
      </div> 
     </div> 
    </div> 
    <div class="features-info text--wrapper300" id="renewable-energy"> 
     <div> 
      <div style="padding: 5px 10px;"> 
       <p class="text text--size-x-small color-darkest">Our main data center partner - Google Cloud - matches 100% the energy consumed by their global operations with renewable energy and maintains a commitment to carbon neutrality.</p> 
      </div> 
     </div> 
    </div> 
    <div class="features-info text--wrapper300" id="ondemand-backup"> 
     <div> 
      <div style="padding: 5px 10px;"> 
       <p class="text text--size-x-small color-darkest">Have a peace of mind with any changes you make to your website by creating an instant backup and be able to restore from it if something goes wrong. You can create up to 5 on-demand backups at a time with our GrowBig and GoGeek package or purchase single backups with StartUp.</p> 
      </div> 
     </div> 
    </div> 
    <div class="features-info text--wrapper300" id="daily-ondemand-backup"> 
     <div> 
      <div style="padding: 5px 10px;"> 
       <p class="text text--size-x-small color-darkest">Have a peace of mind with our daily backup service and the option to create instant backups before uploading changes to your site. You can create and keep up to 5 on-demand backups at a time with our GrowBig, GoGeek and Cloud packages. Restores from backup are easy and free.</p> 
      </div> 
     </div> 
    </div> 
    <div class="features-info text--wrapper300" id="staging-plus-git"> 
     <div> 
      <div style="padding: 5px 10px;"> 
       <p class="text text--size-x-small color-darkest">Our staging tool allows you to create a copy of your site and work on the copy before pushing live any changes to your site. For GoGeek clients we also offer integration with Git so you can create repositories of your website, which you can later access, download and edit on multiple local branches using Git. We have also developed a unique interface that allows you to create repos of the most popular applications (WordPress, Joomla, Magento, Drupal, and PrestaShop).</p> 
      </div> 
     </div> 
    </div> 
    <div class="features-info text--wrapper300" id="wp-tooltip-migrator"> 
     <div> 
      <div style="padding: 5px 10px;"> 
       <p class="text text--size-x-small color-darkest">For clients migrating WordPress sites, we have made it easy to do it yourself. All you need to do is install our WordPress Migrator plugin and generate a token that initiates the migration from your SiteGround hosting account. Afterwards all is simple and you can migrate as many installations as you like hassle-free.</p> 
      </div> 
     </div> 
    </div> 
    <div class="features-info text--wrapper300" id="wp-autoupdates"> 
     <div> 
      <div style="padding: 5px 10px;"> 
       <p class="text text--size-x-small color-darkest">Keeping your WordPress application up-to-date with the latest version is an important step in maintaining a secure site. If you find the update process difficult or simply forget to keep track of the new releases, our automatic WordPress software and plugin updates are for you. You can also schedule how fast your site is updated after a new version is released or even skip a version if you need more time to prepare for the update.</p> 
      </div> 
     </div> 
    </div> 
    <div class="features-info text--wrapper300" id="free-ssl"> 
     <div> 
      <div style="padding: 5px 10px;"> 
       <p class="text text--size-x-small color-darkest">All hosting plans include free Lets Encrypt Standard and Wildcard SSL certificates. For your convenience, the Standard SSL comes preinstalled on your site.</p> 
      </div> 
     </div> 
    </div> 
    <div class="features-info text--wrapper300" id="tooltip-daily-backup"> 
     <div> 
      <div style="padding: 5px 10px;"> 
       <p class="text text--size-x-small color-darkest">We automatically save daily backups and keep up to 30 copies of your account. Backup restore is the fastest way to resolve a large number of common website issues. Backup restores are free on all of our shared hosting plans. For an additional layer of security the backups may be stored in a data center located in another city, state or country.</p> 
      </div> 
     </div> 
    </div> 
    <div class="features-info text--wrapper300" id="free-cdn"> 
     <div> 
      <div style="padding: 5px 10px;"> 
       <p class="text text--size-x-small color-darkest">We've partnered with Cloudflare to provide a free Content Delivery Network (CDN) service to our customers. The CDN tremendously speeds up your load time for visitors from different geographical locations. In order to speed up the delivery of a page, it caches its content, auto-minifies images, exploits RailGun to speed up uncacheable dynamic content, blocks malicious traffic and even reduces SPAM. The CDN network has 152 locations and is growing so your page will be loaded from the one closest to your visitor!</p> 
      </div> 
     </div> 
    </div> 
    <div class="features-info text--wrapper300" id="free-email"> 
     <div> 
      <div style="padding: 5px 10px;"> 
       <p class="text text--size-x-small color-darkest">Create professional email addresses with your website domain at no extra cost. You can create as many accounts as you need, access them using a friendly webmail interface, create forwarders and autoresponders, and more.</p> 
      </div> 
     </div> 
    </div> 
    <div class="features-info text--wrapper300" id="money-back"> 
     <div> 
      <div style="padding: 5px 10px;"> 
       <p class="text text--size-x-small color-darkest">You can try our services with a peace of mind that if something goes wrong, you can get a full refund of your hosting fees (excluding new domain registration fees) within 30 days from signup.</p> 
      </div> 
     </div> 
    </div> 
    <div class="features-info text--wrapper300" id="wp-managed"> 
     <div> 
      <div style="padding: 5px 10px;"> 
       <p class="text text--size-x-small color-darkest">All our plans include WordPress installation, the easy and fast WP Starter site-building wizard, managed auto-updates of the core software and plugins, expert WordPress support, and more.</p> 
      </div> 
     </div> 
    </div> 
    <div class="features-info text--wrapper300" id="client-access"> 
     <div> 
      <div style="padding: 5px 10px;"> 
       <p class="text text--size-x-small color-darkest">On our Cloud plans you can customize the user access to the sites Site Tools. Depending on the management rights you want to assign to them, you can allow them to see as many of the tools as you wish - FTP, MySQL, SSH, email, etc.</p> 
      </div> 
     </div> 
    </div> 
    <div class="features-info text--wrapper300" id="tailor-resources"> 
     <div> 
      <div style="padding: 5px 10px;"> 
       <p class="text text--size-x-small color-darkest">In our Cloud plans you can create custom hosting packages for each site you create, specifying the space, traffic, number of databases, and other resources available.</p> 
      </div> 
     </div> 
    </div> 
    <div class="features-info text--wrapper300" id="out-of-the-box-caching"> 
     <div> 
      <div style="padding: 5px 10px;"> 
       <p class="text text--size-x-small color-darkest">All sites hosted on our servers can take advantage of our unique SuperCacher technology. NGINX-based static and dynamic cache are enabled by default out of the box. Memcached option is also available.</p> 
      </div> 
     </div> 
    </div> <!--Modal boxes-->

    <div style="display: none;"> <!--Web Hosting Modal Box--> 
     <div id="web-migrator" class="mfp-with-anim"> 
      <div class="dialog__header dialog__header--pale-blue flex flex--direction-column flex--justify-flex-end"> 
       <h3 class="title title--regular title--weight-medium title--size-medium title--upper color-darkest title--density-extrasmall">Website Transfer Services</h3> 
      </div> 
      <div class="mfp-fit background-wrap white"> 
       <div class="flex flex--justify-space-between"> 
        <div class="dialog__text"> 
         <h4 class="title title--density-small title--weight-medium title--size-semimedium title--regular color-darkest no-padding--top">Free WordPress Migrator</h4> 
         <p class="text text--size-small color-darkest">For clients migrating WordPress sites, we have made it easy to do it yourself. All you need to do is install our WordPress Migrator plugin and generate a token that initiates the migration from your SiteGround hosting account. Afterwards all is simple and you can migrate as many installations as you like hassle-free.</p>

    <div style="display: none;"> <!--Web Hosting Modal Box--> 
     <div id="staging" class="mfp-with-anim"> 
      <div class="dialog__header dialog__header--pale-yellow flex flex--direction-column flex--justify-flex-end"> 
       <h3 class="title title--regular title--weight-medium title--size-medium title--upper color-darkest title--density-extrasmall">Staging Tool</h3> 
      </div> 
      <div class="mfp-fit background-wrap white"> 
       <div class="flex flex--justify-space-between"> 
        <div class="dialog__text"> 
         <p class="text text--size-small color-darkest">Many of our customers maintain WordPress sites that require updates and changes as their businesses grow. However, big changes can be risky and its a good practice to test any major change in a safe environment that wont affect your live site. Weve developed a tool that creates a copy of your site, allows you to work on the testing site, and then push the changes to your live site with confidence - in one click! Just to be on the safe side, we also perform automatic backups each time you upload a staging version to production. The tool is available on the GrowBig and GoGeek plans.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div class="center-elem--767">

      </div>

       <div class="flex flex--justify-space-between"> 
        <div class="dialog__text"> 
         <p class="text text--size-small color-darkest">On GoGeek plan you can register your clients as users in your Account and give them white-label access to the Site Tools of the sites you build for them. When your client logs in the Site Tools of their website, they wont see SiteGround logo or name anywhere.</p>

          </g>
         </svg> 25 May, 2021</li> 
        <li><a href="/blog/geographically-distributed-backups/" target="_blank">Read More</a></li> 
       </ul> 
      </article> 
     </div> 
    </section>

  <script type="text/javascript">
var width = null;
var orientation = null;
var headerFixedClass = false;
var inPageVatStatus = false;
var vatSwitchInProgress = false;

var urlMappings = {
				'us': 'siteground.com',				'uk': 'siteground.co.uk',				'es': 'siteground.es',				'it': 'it.siteground.com',				'de': 'siteground.com',				'eu': 'siteground.com',				'au': 'siteground.com',				'la': 'es.siteground.com',				'ww': 'siteground.com'			};

var hostnamePrefix = null;

var sCoRegionMapping = {
		'us': 'MWc9PQ==',		'uk': 'MEE9PQ==',		'es': 'MFE9PQ==',		'it': 'MUE9PQ==',		'de': 'MDBVPQ==',		'eu': 'MXc9PQ==',		'au': 'Mnc9PQ==',		'la': 'Mmc9PQ==',		'ww': 'MHc9PQ=='	};
	var hostPrefix = 'www.';

function formatPriceHalfDown(value) {
	var exp = -2;
	value = +value;
	exp = +exp;
	type = 'round';

    	var difference = (parseFloat(value) * 100) - (Math.floor(value * 100));
	if (difference <= 0.5 && difference !== 0) {
		type = 'floor';
	}
    
	// If the value is not a number or the exp is not an integer...
	if (isNaN(value)) {
		return 0;
	}

	// Shift
	value = value.toString().split('e');
	value = Math[type](+(value[0] + 'e' + (value[1] ? (+value[1]
